string-array.name: tooltips
string-array.item: Farsi is written right to left. Dots are added at the end of the word.
Letters have a different shape depending on their position in the word.
Numbers are witten left to right. 1000 is ۱۰۰۰.
Certain letters, even in the middle of a word, do not connect with the next one.
Click on the red letters to hear their pronunciations. Click on the blue letters to practive drawing.
